title: Debunking your favorite NFL officiating conspiracy theories
content: Are the refs penalizing some teams more than others? Which coaches win challenges? We crunched the numbers.

title: Patriots releasing veteran S Peppers, source says
content: The Patriots are releasing veteran safety Jabrill Peppers, a source told ESPN's Adam Schefter. A nine-year veteran, Peppers has $4.32 million left on his contract.

title: Miami LB Hayes charged with vehicular homicide
content: Miami linebacker Adarius Hayes has been charged with three counts of vehicular homicide and one count of reckless driving with serious bodily injury following an investigation into a May crash that killed three people.

title: FBI reveals more Pete Rose gambling documents
content: The Federal Bureau of Investigation has released new documents relating to baseball great Pete Rose, his former bookie and the gambling scandal that led to Rose's previous ban from the sport and from entry into the Hall of Fame.

title: Alcaraz overcomes knee issue for 3rd-round win
content: Carlos Alcaraz overcame a knee issue that prompted a medical timeout to advance past Luciano Darderi in the third round of the US Open on Friday.

title: Gators baseball coach suspended for regional rant
content: Florida has suspended baseball coach Kevin O'Sullivan for the first three games of the 2026 regular season following his profanity-laced language directed at site administrators during an NCAA regional.

title: Betting stampede moves Texas' odds vs. OSU
content: Ohio State opened as a 3-point favorite over Texas months ago, but sportsbooks have been reporting a steady stream of money on the Longhorns throughout the summer, causing the line to move.

title: Dolphins OLB coach arrested on battery charge
content: Dolphins outside linebackers coach Ryan Crow has been placed on administrative leave after he was arrested on a domestic battery charge.

title: Sources: Okla. St. QB Hejny has foot surgery
content: Oklahoma State starting quarterback Hauss Hejny underwent surgery after suffering a broken bone in his left foot during the Cowboys' season opener, sources confirmed to ESPN.

title: üèà Fantasy football: Do Not Draft list
content: The annual hit is back, with players Eric Karabell feels are going earlier than they should in drafts this summer.

title: Four questions in the Micah Parsons trade aftermath: Why in the world would Dallas do this?
content: What are the Cowboys doing? Did they get enough in return? And does Parsons put the Packers at the top of the NFC? Let's sort through this wild trade.

title: A new look in Green Bay: Parsons trade continues Packers' aggressive offseason
content: Signs of change in Green Bay include paying up to trade for Parsons after finally taking a WR in the first round.

title: 'Can you do it without Travis and Shedeur?': What will Colorado 2.0 look like for Deion Sanders?
content: Colorado's new era begins Friday. Deion Sanders says, "It's always going to be a challenge, I don't mind that."

title: 'Split' title 35 years ago? Don't tell Colorado and Georgia Tech that
content: The two teams are meeting in Week 1, 35 years after splitting the 1990 national title in controversial fashion.

title: NBA predictions: 10 teams that could exceed, fall short of ESPN's forecast
content: Too low on OKC? Too high on the Spurs? Tim Bontemps breaks down ESPN's Summer Forecast win predictions.

title: From Collier to Clark and more: How injury returns could impact the playoffs
content: Napheesa Collier and Breanna Stewart are back, with more injured stars eyeing returns before the postseason.

title: Breaking down Texas-Ohio State, LSU-Clemson and 24 other matchups in an epic Week 1
content: College football is back in a big way, with Arch Manning and Texas taking on the defending champs, a showdown in Death Valley and more.

title: To transfer or not to transfer? For USMNT players in a World Cup year, there's no perfect answer
content: The goal is clear: find your best form and make the 2026 World Cup roster. But USMNT hopefuls must decide whether a transfer is necessary to achieve it.

title: Why Man United's best player may be their biggest problem
content: As Manchester United's freefall continues, is captain and talisman Bruno Fernandes becoming more of a liability than an asset?

title: As Coco Gauff struggles to change her serve, it's been a rocky US Open already
content: Gauff knew she needed to make a change to her serve -- and she took a gamble, hiring a new coach just days before the US Open.

title: Let's predict the NFL draft: Kiper's 10 preseason takes, including why all eyes are on Penn State
content: Which school will have the most picks? How many QBs will go in Round 1? Who is a sleeper for WR1? Mel Kiper Jr. makes predictions for the 2026 NFL draft class.

title: Liz Loza's draft rules (there are none!), five players to pick and two to fade
content: It's finally time to make picks, so consider the trends surrounding these players as you prepare your draft board.

title: Mike Clay's Playbook, Part 3: How to manage your team post-draft
content: The draft is just the beginning of the fun. Mike Clay gives you a guide to being a savvy, championship-winning manager.

title: The five stories that explain why Arch Manning was built for this moment
content: How did the Texas quarterback learn to handle the pressure he's facing as the most famous college football player in the country?

title: Lee Corso's impact felt far beyond 'GameDay' audience
content: The larger-than-life face of college football has touched so many, from fans and players to colleagues and friends.

title: Baylor's anthracite and chrome combo headline best college football uniforms from Week 1
content: While Baylor revives its gold chrome helmets, Utah State will be donning cow print helmets that have a hilarious origin story.

title: Ben Shelton and Trinity Rodman relationship timeline
content: The NWSL player playfully challenged the tennis star with a question about his 2nd-round US Open performance.

title: Transfer rumors, news: Spurs eye Sancho to replace Son
content: Tottenham Hotspur are considering a move to sign Manchester United winger Jadon Sancho as a replacement for Son Heung-Min. Transfer Talk has the latest news, gossip and rumors.

title: 'The Rich Eisen Show' on ESPN: How to listen and watch
content: 'The Rich Eisen Show' is joining forces with ESPN platforms! Find out how to get your weekday dose of pop culture and sports now.

title: India's GDP grows at robust 7.8% in Q1 FY26; beats estimates by wide margin
content: India's GDP surged by 7.8% in the first quarter of FY 2025-26, exceeding expectations and surpassing the previous year's 6.5% growth. This robust performance is a welcome boost amidst concerns about potential impacts from newly imposed US tariffs. The agriculture and tertiary sectors showed significant improvements, while mining and quarrying experienced a decline.

title: ‚ÄòUS brand is in toilet‚Äô: Sullivan says Trump‚Äôs trade war is pushing India toward China
content: Jake Sullivan criticizes Donald Trump's trade policies towards India, asserting they jeopardize the strategic partnership built to counter China. The recent 50% tariff on Indian exports risks pushing India closer to Beijing, as New Delhi seeks to hedge against perceived American unreliability. Sullivan argues Trump's actions undermine US credibility and hand China a diplomatic advantage.

title: 'Social Truth' vs data: What Trump doesn't get about India's 'dead' economy
content: India's GDP surged by 7.8% in the April-June quarter, exceeding expectations and marking the fastest growth in five quarters, driven by robust farm output, private spending, and a thriving services sector. Despite this strong performance, looming US tariffs threaten India's export engine and could potentially dampen future growth, impacting employment and private investment.

title: Putin to visit India in Dec; big signal to Trump amid raging trade war
content: Vladimir Putin will visit India in December, confirmed by the Kremlin, amidst growing ties between the two nations following US trade tariffs on New Delhi. Putin is also scheduled to meet Narendra Modi at the SCO Summit in China. Discussions will include preparations for the December visit, highlighting the continued strategic partnership despite Western pressure on Russia.

title: Musk's lawyers to judge: Reject OpenAI‚Äôs ask for chats; unnecessary for trial
content: Elon Musk and Sam Altman's legal battle intensifies as Musk's lawyers attempt to block OpenAI from acquiring documents from Meta regarding an alleged $97.4 billion bid for OpenAI's assets. OpenAI claims Musk approached Meta CEO Mark Zuckerberg to join the bid, which Zuckerberg declined.

title: 'Fight larger battle': Why Sibal's advice may not stop Kejriwal from targeting Cong
content: Kapil Sibal has advised Arvind Kejriwal to cease his attacks on the Congress party and instead focus on the larger battle against the BJP. This comes after Kejriwal alleged a BJP-Congress nexus, questioning why no major Congress leader has been arrested in the National Herald case. Sibal reminded Kejriwal of his past apologies for baseless allegations.

title: AI researcher quits Meta: Reveals reason for exit; followed Zuckerberg‚Äôs advice
content: Meta's Superintelligence Lab is experiencing departures, including AI scientist Rishabh Agarwal, who left after five months despite a reported million-dollar salary, citing a desire for "a different kind of risk." Agarwal's exit follows those of other researchers, some of whom have returned to OpenAI, raising questions about Meta's ambitious superintelligence program and its ability to retain top AI talent.

title: Travis Hunter & Leanna Lenee: Surprise baby news sparks fan outrage; 'most expensive divorce' talk
content: Jacksonville Jaguars' rookie Travis Hunter and his wife, Leanna Lenee, recently welcomed their first child, sparking a wave of criticism from fans online. The couple, who married in June, faced speculation about their relationship and pregnancy, which they never publicly addressed. Despite the negativity, Hunter and Lenee remain committed to each other, having previously defended their bond against online hate.

title: JD Vance meltdown over Politico story: Claims 'foreign influence operation‚Äô
content: JD Vance has strongly criticized a Politico report questioning Steve Witkoff's role in Russia-Ukraine talks, labeling it a "foreign influence operation." Vance defended Witkoff's progress in negotiations, highlighting narrowed issues like security guarantees and territorial concessions. The controversy has sparked online abuse targeting the Politico reporter, raising concerns about backchannel diplomacy efforts.

title: DPL 2025: Ugly brawl breaks out; Lady umpire intervenes - Watch
content: A fiery clash marred the Delhi Premier League eliminator between West Delhi Lionz and South Delhi Superstarz following Krish Yadav's dismissal. The incident escalated into a physical altercation involving players from both teams, requiring umpire intervention. This overshadowed South Delhi Superstarz's score of 201/5 and an earlier altercation involving Digvesh Rathi and Nitish Rana.

title: 'Not the smartest': Oracle founder's candid take on Bill Gates; likens him to Rockefeller
content: Larry Ellison lauded Bill Gates' relentless drive, comparing him to John D. Rockefeller. Despite acknowledging others might be smarter, Ellison emphasized Gates' unmatched focus and endurance. He highlighted Gates' pivotal role in Microsoft's success, noting his 'utterly relentless' nature. The Oracle founder's remarks underscore Gates' reputation as a powerhouse, capable of dominating through execution.

title: Savannah James Speaks Out: Reveals intense bond with LeBron; 'He wants to live in my skin'
content: LeBron James and his wife, Savannah, celebrated over two decades of togetherness, their bond highlighted in the Netflix docuseries 'Starting 5.' Savannah shared insights into their deep connection, emphasizing LeBron's profound love and describing him as her 'bestie.' LeBron consistently acknowledges Savannah's pivotal role in his NBA success, attributing his achievements to her unwavering support.

title: How Zuckerberg may be behind Trump's ‚Äòtariff threat‚Äô to countries imposing digital taxes
content: Donald Trump is considering tariffs on nations with digital taxes. This follows a meeting with Meta CEO Mark Zuckerberg. Zuckerberg voiced concerns about these taxes. Trump believes they unfairly target US tech companies. He also thinks they favor Chinese firms. Trump warns of tariffs and semiconductor export restrictions. Meta confirmed the meeting, stating infrastructure investments being discussed.

title: 'Hate remarks': BJP slams Moitra's shocking comment on Shah; complaint filed
content: TMC MP Mahua Moitra ignited controversy with a remark targeting Amit Shah, allegedly stating his "head should be cut off" regarding illegal immigration. The BJP strongly condemned Moitra's statement as hateful, questioning if it reflected the TMC's stance. Moitra accused the Union government of border security negligence, referencing PM Modi's Independence Day speech on infiltrators.

title: Trump wrecking America-India ties, admits US Congress report
content: Donald Trump has never disguised his transactional approach to foreign policy. But in 2025, his behaviour toward India has crossed into something far more disruptive. He has claimed credit for ending a May India-Pakistan conflict (a claim Delhi flatly rejects). He has invited Pakistan‚Äôs army chief to lunch at the White House, prompting anger in Delhi that Washington is ‚Äútreating India and Pakistan as equals.‚Äù And he has escalated a tariff war, leaving Indian exporters facing what the US Congressional Research Service (CRS) describes as a ‚Äú50% tariff on India on top of existing tariffs.‚Äù

title: Sikh man shot dead in LA: What prompted cops to take deadly action?
content: A LAPD police video revealed the fatal shooting of Gurpreet Singh, a 35-year-old Sikh man, after 911 calls reported him wielding a machete and threatening people. Singh, seen performing Gatka, charged at officers after a car chase, leading to the shooting. The incident is under investigation, with reviews to determine if the use of force was justified.

title: Nick Wright on Swift & Kelce: Slams ‚Äúpublicity stunt‚Äù talk; reacts to engagement news
content: Following Taylor Swift and Travis Kelce's engagement announcement, sports analyst Nick Wright defended their relationship against critics on The Dan Patrick Show, urging those who doubted its authenticity to acknowledge their error. Jason Kelce also offered congratulations on the New Heights podcast, celebrating the couple's exciting news. Fans eagerly anticipate wedding details.

title: 'Disgusting!': Sreesanth's wife slams Lalit Modi for digging up Slapgate video
content: Lalit Modi's comments reignite the 2008 Harbhajan Singh-Sreesanth controversy. Modi claims to possess unseen footage of the incident. Sreesanth's wife strongly criticizes Modi and Michael Clarke. She accuses them of exploiting the past for publicity. She highlights the impact on her family and children. The incident occurred during an IPL match between Kings XI Punjab and Mumbai Indians.

title: Micah Parsons Trade Talk: Jerry Jones shifts tone; Cowboys hint at blockbuster move
content: Dallas Cowboys traded Micah Parsons to Green Bay Packers. This move frees up 19 million dollars. Cowboys now have 42 million dollars in cap space for 2025. This allows them to sign other players. They can extend contracts of DaRon Bland and Tyler Smith. Jerry Jones mentioned Parsons could bring resources in a trade.

title: Big reveal? 'Coaching my future': R Ashwin on plans after IPL retirement
content: Ravichandran Ashwin, after retiring from the IPL, is contemplating a move into coaching. The veteran off-spinner, who recently concluded his IPL career with Chennai Super Kings, expressed his interest in guiding and mentoring players. Ashwin revealed he had discussions about a player-coach role during his time with Rajasthan Royals and gained coaching experience in the Tamil Nadu Premier League.

title: 'India ready': PM Modi explains why good ties with China are 'crucial'
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi emphasized India's commitment to strengthening ties with China based on mutual respect and interest, ahead of his visit to Tianjin for the SCO Summit. He highlighted the potential for India-China relations to foster regional and global stability.

title: A masterclass with Adil Hussain: How bold and intimate scenes are shot in Bollywood
content: When it comes to bold and intimate scenes, often considered one of the most delicate aspects of performance in Indian cinema, Adil Hussain brings a unique combination of honesty, clinical precision, and deep respect for the craft. In this special masterclass with ETimes, the critically acclaimed actor opens up about his process, the inhibitions Indian actors face, the role of trust, and how dignity can be preserved even in the most vulnerable of on-screen moments.

title: CWG 2030: India submits proposal; Ahmedabad put forward as the host
content: India bids to host the 2030 Commonwealth Games. Ahmedabad is proposed as the host city for the Centenary edition. The bid emphasizes 'Vasudhaiva Kutumbakam' and 'Atithi Devo Bhava'. PT Usha highlights India's sporting capabilities and values. The Games aim to inspire a new generation through sport. This aligns with India's vision to be a leading sporting nation.

title: India's GDP to grow by upto 6.8%; CEA says US tariff impact 'short-term'
content: Chief Economic Advisor anticipates India's economy to grow between 6.3% and 6.8% in FY26, dismissing concerns about high US tariffs causing significant risks. The economy expanded by 7.8% in April-June, driven by a robust farm sector, outpacing China's growth. Manufacturing activity remained steady, contributing to the overall positive economic outlook.

title: Record! India pacer Nabi clinches 5-wicket haul to achieve rare milestone
content: North Zone's pacers dominated the Duleep Trophy quarterfinal against East Zone. Auqib Nabi's hat-trick and five-wicket haul helped dismiss East Zone for 230, while Arshdeep Singh and Harshit Rana delivered impactful spells. North Zone extended their score to 405, establishing a 183-run lead. Arshdeep, returning from injury, showcased excellent form.

title: Dharmasthala case: Sujata wants to withdraw complaint during SIT interrogation
content: Sujata Bhat, who alleged her daughter disappeared from Dharmasthala temple in 2003, reportedly wants to withdraw her complaint. During SIT interrogation, her statements contradicted earlier claims, suggesting she was lying and obstructing justice. Despite her potential withdrawal, the SIT will likely continue investigating due to the serious allegations and ongoing judicial process.

title: Ryan Crow arrested: Dolphins coach held on domestic battery charge
content: Miami Dolphins outside linebackers coach Ryan Crow was arrested in Fort Lauderdale on a domestic battery charge and is being held without bond. The Dolphins have placed him on administrative leave and are gathering information, communicating with the NFL. This situation disrupts the team's defensive preparations during the preseason, especially with key players already dealing with injuries.

title: 6 pacts & 7 MoUs: What PM Modi achieved in Japan visit - key outcomes
content: India and Japan have launched an Economic Security Initiative, focusing on supply chain resilience and collaboration in sectors like semiconductors and clean energy. The countries are also strengthening ties through the Japan-India Artificial Intelligence Initiative, aiming to enhance cooperation in AI technologies. Both nations plan to increase people-to-people exchanges and foster business collaboration.

title: UP CM Yogi Adityanath says Sambhal report reveals how conspiracy unfolded
content: Uttar Pradesh CM Yogi Adityanath revealed a riot conspiracy in Sambhal, based on a judicial commission report. The report highlights a significant demographic shift, with the Hindu population declining drastically since Independence. Adityanath vowed to prevent further demographic changes and ensure equal benefits for all citizens, referencing past targeted actions against Hindus under previous administrations.

title: Bihar SIR: EC flags 'doubtful citizenship' of 3L voters; border districts in focus
content: In Bihar, nearly three lakh electors are under scrutiny due to "doubtful citizenship" during the Special Intensive Revision of electoral rolls. These flagged individuals are part of the 7.24 crore voters listed in the draft rolls, with suspicions arising from document discrepancies noted by Electoral Registration Officers. Most cases are reported from border and migrant-heavy districts.

title: Watch: Who is the funniest in Team India? Rohit Sharma discloses
content: Rohit Sharma fondly recalled Shikhar Dhawan's humor, highlighting his ability to lighten the mood in the Indian dressing room. Sharma expressed his desire to hit every bowler for a six, emphasizing his aggressive mindset. Despite retiring from T20Is and Tests, Rohit remains focused on ODIs, anticipating his return in the upcoming series against Australia.

title: Cody & Brandi Rhodes: Welcome second child before 12th anniversary
content: Cody Rhodes and Brandi Rhodes, a celebrated wrestling couple, recently welcomed their second daughter, Leilani Ella Runnels, on August 29, 2025. The couple, who are set to celebrate their 12th wedding anniversary in September, shared their joy on social media. Leilani joins their first daughter, Liberty, born in 2021, expanding the Rhodes family.

title: 'I want to quit': Man United boss Amorim amid calls for sacking
content: Manchester United's manager, Ruben Amorim, confessed to considering leaving after their shocking League Cup defeat to Grimsby Town. Amorim expressed frustration with his team's inconsistency, admitting he sometimes hates his players. Despite contemplating his position, he's now focused on the upcoming Premier League clash against Burnley and looks to correct things moving forward.

title: 'Will rid India of illegal foreigners': Amit Shah renews vow in Assam
content: Union home minister Amit Shah affirmed BJP's commitment to remove infiltrators from India, highlighting PM Modi's demography mission to identify them. Speaking in Guwahati, Shah praised Assam's efforts against illegal immigration, referencing Golap Borbora's voter list cleanup.

title: PM 'abused': After clash, war of words; BJP seeks apology, Cong makes big claim
content: A political controversy erupts. It involves Congress and BJP. Allegations of abuse target Prime Minister Narendra Modi. The incident occurred during a rally in Darbhanga. Amit Shah demands an apology from Rahul Gandhi. Rahul Gandhi speaks of truth prevailing. Congress claims BJP agents made the remarks. Clashes between party workers break out in Patna. Nitish Kumar condemns the language used.

title: World C'ships: No medal! Sindhu suffers major setback in QF
content: PV Sindhu's quest for a record sixth World Championships medal ended in a quarterfinal defeat against Indonesia's Putri Kusuma Wardani. Despite a strong second-game comeback, Sindhu faltered in the decider, allowing Wardani to secure the victory. Earlier, India's mixed doubles pair also exited, losing to Malaysian opponents Chen Tang Jie and Toh Ee Wei.

title: Tariff war enters campus: LPU bans American colas; a campus lesson beyond tokenism
content: Lovely Professional University (LPU) in Punjab has banned American soft drinks, including Coca-Cola and Pepsi, from its campus. Announced by Chancellor Ashok Kumar Mittal, the move responds to the US doubling tariffs on Indian goods to 50%. Framed as part of a modern ‚ÄòSwadeshi 2.0‚Äô campaign, the ban encourages students and citizens to prioritise Indian products, echoing the 1905 Swadeshi movement.

title: Trump cancels Harris' security; why Biden extended her protection
content: Donald Trump has reportedly cancelled the Secret Service protection extended to Kamala Harris by Joe Biden, exceeding the legally mandated six months post her vice presidency. Effective September 1, 2025, Harris will no longer receive Secret Service agents or threat intelligence, just before her national book tour promoting her memoir, "107 Days".

title: Arjun, Saaniya attend function; Sachin pens emotional note - 'A blessing'
content: Sachin Tendulkar celebrated his mother, Rajni Tendulkar's, birthday with a heartfelt Instagram post featuring intimate family pictures. The cricket legend expressed deep gratitude and admiration for his mother's strength and blessings in a touching caption. His emotional message and family snapshots resonated with fans across social media, highlighting the special bond he shares with his mother.

title: 10 must-see night sky events in September: Blood Moon, Jupiter-Moon pairing and more
content: September 2025 offers a celestial spectacle with a total lunar eclipse visible across Asia and Africa, along with rare planetary alignments featuring Saturn and Neptune. Stargazers can witness Venus occulted by the Moon and observe Saturn at opposition. The new moon on September 21 creates ideal conditions for viewing deep-sky objects like the Milky Way.

title: Gold prices soar Rs 2,100 to record high of Rs 1,03,670/10 gm; silver slips Rs 1,000
content: Gold prices in the national capital soared to a record high of Rs 1,03,670 per 10 grams, driven by persistent buying, a weaker rupee, and global uncertainties. Silver prices eased after reaching record highs, while international markets saw spot gold remain steady. Market participants are closely monitoring US-India trade tensions and the upcoming US PCE Price Index release.

title: Delhi High Court Asks Hospital To Treat Ill Child In Economically Weak Section
content: The Delhi High Court on Friday directed a private hospital to provide medical treatment under the EWS category to a 12-year-old boy in dire need of a ventilator bed after he fell from a building.

title: PM Modi, Putin To Meet On Monday On Sidelines Of SCO Summit: Kremlin Aide
content: Russian President Vladimir Putin will meet Prime Minister Narendra Modi on Monday on the sidelines of the Shanghai Cooperation Organisation (SCO) Summit in China's Tianjin, Kremlin foreign policy aide Yuri Ushakov said on Friday.

title: Conspiracy For Riots Unfolded In UP's Sambhal: Yogi Adityanath On Judicial Panel Report
content: Yogi Adityanath said the judicial commission report on the Sambhal violence confirmed a conspiracy for riots in the town, asserting that the state is now moving towards "satisfaction", not "appeasement".

title: BJP Workers Vandalise Congress HQ In Kolkata Over Abusive Words Against PM
content: Union Home Minister Amit Shah on Friday concluded his two-day visit to Assam, where he set the BJP's ball rolling for the 2026 assembly elections with sharp attacks on the Congress leadership, including Rahul Gandhi and Gaurav Gogoi.

title: Rupee Crashes 51 Paise To Close At All-time Low Of 88.09 Against US Dollar
content: The rupee breached the 88-mark for the first time and closed at an all-time low of 88.09 against the US dollar, registering a sharp decline of 51 paise amid a massive outflow of foreign funds and heightened tensions over a trade deal betwee

title: How Ukraine Destroyed 2 Russian Bridges Using A Pair Of Cheap Drones
content: Ukraine says it pulled off a major strike inside Russia using nothing more than a pair of cheap drones and sharp intelligence.

title: PUCL Report On Manipur Violence "One-Sided Account": Meitei Civil Body
content: The Delhi Meetei Coordinating Committee (DMCC) on Friday raised objections to a recent report published by the People's Union for Civil Liberties (PUCL), claiming that it presented a one-sided account of the Manipur conflict.

title: India's Forex Reserves Drops $4.38 Billion To $690.72 Billion: RBI
content: India's forex reserves dropped USD 4.386 billion to USD 690.72 billion for the week ended August 22, the Reserve Bank of India (RBI) said on Friday.

title: Japan To Invest 10 Trillion Yen In India Over Next Decade
content: Japan on Friday set an investment target of 10 trillion yen (approx Rs 60,000 cr) in India over a decade, and the two sides sealed a raft of big-ticket pacts, including a framework for defence ties and a 10-year roadmap

title: Tirumala Temple And Its Growing Challenge Of Waste Management
content: The Tirumala Tirupati Devasthanams is confronting a significant and escalating challenge in managing the solid waste generated by the millions of pilgrims who visit the hill shrine annually.

title: Mayawati Promotes Nephew Akash Anand As BSP National Convener: Report
content: Bahujan Samaj Party national president Mayawati has promoted her nephew Akash Anand, appointing him as the BSP's national convener, party sources said.

title: India, Japan Call For Pahalgam Attack's Perpetrators To Be Brought To Justice Without Delay
content: India and Japan strongly condemned the Pahalgam terror attack and called for the perpetrators, organisers, and financiers of this reprehensible act to be brought to justice without any delay.

title: Delhi Records Wettest August In 15 Years With 399.8 mm Rainfall
content: Delhi has recorded its wettest August in the past 15 years, with 399.8 mm of rainfall reported so far, according to data.

title: Qatar Wants To Negotiate Trade Pact With India, Says Piyush Goyal
content: Commerce and Industry Minister Piyush Goyal on Friday said a proposed Free Trade Agreement (FTA) with Oman will be finalised soon, and Qatar also wants to negotiate a pact with India.

title: 'Jab We Met' In Indore: Woman Runs Away To Marry Lover, Returns Wedded To Another
content: In 2007, the Shahid Kapoor and Kareena Kapoor starrer 'Jab We Met' won hearts with its unique script, direction and acting. 18 years later, Indore has seen a strikingly similar storyline play out.

title: Putin Would Have "Played" Trump If No Zelensky Talks By Monday: Macron
content: If Russian President Vladimir Putin doesn't commit by Monday to meet Ukraine's Volodymyr Zelensky, he would have duped US President Donald Trump, French President Emmanuel Macron said.

title: Three-Member Committee To Probe Vaishno Devi Landslide That Killed 35
content: Jammu and Kashmir Lieutenant Governor Manoj Sinha has ordered a probe into Tuesday's landslide at Mata Vaishno Devi, in which 35 pilgrims were killed.

title: "Word Spreads Faster Than Wind About Woman Harassed For Dowry": Top Court
content: Word spreads faster than the wind about a woman being harassed for dowry by the parents-in-law, the Supreme Court on Friday said while acquitting a woman accused of subjecting her daughter-in-law to cruelty.

title: Putin To Meet Iranian President After Europe Triggers Fresh Sanctions
content: Russian President Vladimir Putin will discuss Tehran's nuclear programme with his Iranian counterpart Masoud Pezeshkian in China on Monday, a meeting that comes as Iran faces fresh Western pressure.

title: Cop Caught On Camera Slapping Civilian In Srinagar; Probe Ordered
content: An inquiry has been ordered against a traffic policeman for allegedly slapping a person in the Bemina locality here, an officer said on Friday.

title: Women biotech scientists await funds for research
content: 75 candidates selected for Science Ministry‚Äôs DBT Biocare programme in March unable to commence research

title: BJP supporters vandalise West Bengal Congress headquarters in Kolkata
content: West Bengal Congress president Subhankar Sarkar has demanded arrest of BJP leader Rakesh Singh who led the attack

title: West Bengal CM hails Supreme Court‚Äôs intervention on detention of migrant workers
content: PIL on detention of migrant workers was filed before the Supreme Court by the West Bengal Migrant Welfare Board

title: ED conducts searches in FEMA case against Haryana-based real estate firm
content: ED says BPTP Ltd. got FDI of over ‚Çπ500 crore from Mauritius-based entities in violation of rules; Agency searches company‚Äôs offices as well as residences of its chairman and director

title: A.P. officials on alert as first flood warning level issued for Godavari at Bhadrachalam in Telangana
content: Water level is likely to reach the second warning level of 48 feet at Bhadrachalam on Saturday, says official;  heavy rain is expected in north coastal A.P.

title: Across dynasties and decades, Milad-un-Nabi threads faith, festivity and service
content: Hyderabad‚Äôs Milad takes on added significance this time as the city joins the global community¬†in marking the 1,500th birth anniversary of Prophet Muhammed with a grand juloos, prayer meetings and service activities

title: The ocean‚Äôs new eyes: Fishermen to join INCOIS in tracking marine trends
content: As part of a citizen-science push, INCOIS will equip fishermen with sensors and satellite tools¬†to feed real-time data from the sea, strengthening advisories on fishing grounds, safety alerts and long-term ocean research

title: India signs pact with Japan for low carbon technologies
content: The Memorandum of Cooperation will facilitate implementation of projects contributing to greenhouse gas reduction or removal and sustainable development in India

title: M.P. BJP worker files complaint after social media users claim he ‚Äòabused‚Äô PM Modi in Bihar
content: The remarks on PM Modi triggered a political storm in poll-bound Bihar as well as in other parts of the country

title: Bihar Cabinet approves Mukhya Mantri Mahila Rozgar Yojana
content: As per the scheme, one woman from each family will get ‚Çπ10,000 as grant to start a business; this will give women the opportunity to start businesses of their own choice and will create employment opportunities in the State itself

title: Kozhikode Corpn. struggles to identify land for dog park
content: None of the land under the civic body found suitable; expressions of interest invited from private parties; Opposition councillors stage walkout, insisting the park be built on Corporation‚Äôs plot

title: Facing outcry, L-G announces probe into Vaishno Devi Shrine landslip that left 34 dead on August 26
content: Several civil society bodies, including Jammu High Court Bar Association, demanded a probe into¬†the incident.¬†¬†

title: NHAI allocates ‚Çπ100 crore to repair Kullu-Manali road damaged in flash floods
content: Manali remains cut off after rain, floods and landslides battered NH 21; NHAI is exploring long-term solutions like construction of tunnels and elevated structures

title: Enforcement Directorate seeks fugitive tag for Amira Pure Foods CMD and director
content: The agency tells Delhi court that the two are abroad; proceedings initiated to confiscate assets worth ‚Çπ131 crore

title: Modi wins elections by stealing votes, says Rahul Gandhi
content: Praising the people‚Äôs participation in Voter Adhikar Yatra, Gandhi says the people of Bihar have given a lot of energy to the yatra and slogans against vote theft are echoing across the country

title: Arms and explosives recovered from Maoist dump in Chhattisgarh

title: Congress targets Amit Shah, accuses him of spreading ‚Äòlies‚Äô against Rahul Gandhi
content: The Congress attack comes after Mr. Shah, while addressing an event in Guwahati, said the Congress leader should apologise for the ‚Äòabuses‚Äô hurled at Prime Minister Narendra Modi and his late mother during the Yatra in Bihar.

title: Supreme Court seeks clarity from government if Bengali speakers are presumed as ‚Äòforeigners‚Äô
content: The petition filed by an NGO alleged that labourers from West Bengal were detained without due verification, procedural safeguards or compliance with established inter-State coordination protocols

title: Important for India, China to work together to bring stability to world economic order: PM
content: India is ready to advance bilateral relations from a strategic and long-term perspective on the basis of mutual respect, mutual interest and mutual sensitivity, and to enhance strategic communication to address our developmental challenges, says PM Narendra Modi

title: Govt. extends ECHS benefits to medically boarded-out cadets
content: According to Ministry of Defence, the new measure, applicable to cadets medically boarded out before completing training as well as future cases, seeks to ease the humanitarian and financial burden

title: The Hindu Impact: V. Somanna promises review to fast-track Bengaluru Suburban Railway Project
content: His assurance follows The Hindu‚Äôs ‚ÄòSpotlight‚Äô report published on August 29, titled ‚ÄòA dream derailed‚Äô, which highlighted the project‚Äôs setbacks

title: Sasikanth Senthil begins indefinite fast against the Centre for withholding SSA funds from Tamil Nadu
content: The Union government has a moral obligation to release the money first and then discuss the disagreements with the State government. It should not disrupt the education of children, the Tiruvallur¬† Congress MP says¬†

title: Bihar SIR: Eight border districts account for most notices by Election Commission of India
content: Districts sharing borders with Nepal and West Bengal have highest number of voters who did not submit needed documents or whose eligibility and citizenship are under doubt; hearings to begin next week

title: Uber resumes bike taxi services in Karnataka as ‚ÄòBike Direct‚Äô¬†
content: Rapido has recently introduced a feature called Bike Direct to continue its services, describing it as a ‚Äònon-profit initiative‚Äô

title: Railways notifies 150 special trains for festive season rush
content: The special trains will be running from September 21 to November 30, covering the festivals of Durga Puja, Diwali and Chhath Puja

title: Animal Husbandry dept. to launch e-Samrudha digital livestock and e-health management system on August 30
content: E-Samrudha envisions integrating services related to livestock management and veterinary services in the State on a single platform

title: Indian Navy reaffirms commitment to dialogue, trust and cooperative security in Indian Ocean Region
content: The emerging leaders discuss maritime cooperation at IONS panel, emphasising technology, training, and regional security in the Indian Ocean

title: Speaker Om Birla flags decline in standards of debate
content: At SC/ST welfare meet in Bhubaneswar, calls for equity-based nation ensuring rights of Dalits, tribals, marginalised sections

title: Land assignment rules an Onam gift for residents of Kerala‚Äôs hill districts, says Minister
content: The 1960 land assignment Act was amended and new rules made to solve the over six-decade-long land-related problems, particularly in Idukki. The rules, likely to be implemented by mid-Sept., give the govt. the power to grant permission for using land for purposes other than stated

content: New rules legalise construction violations until June 7, 2024.  However, it is silent on permission for new constructions and farmers‚Äô groups and the Idukki diocese of the Syro Malabar Church have raised concerns

title: Sharmila accuses TDP-JSP-BJP combine of crippling Vizag Steel Plant

title: Call letters despatched to 15,340 DSC-qualified candidates so far, says TDP leader

title: Nikita Kucherov leads winger ratings in NHL 26
content: defender ratings revealed in NHL 26 . ten from the right and 10 from the left . Nikita Kucherov has 96 OVR, making him fourth on the overall ranking . matthew mcdonald's and samir khan are the top 20 wingers .

title: What we're hearing before transfer deadline day: Liverpool to return for Isak?
content: the transfer window is only open across Europe until Monday . sportsmail's reporters are hearing about possible deals if Alexander Isak returns to the first-team . the premier league champions have played the long game with the striker . click here for more transfer news .

title: News: Red Sox, Mets promote pitching prospects
content: the fantasy baseball buzz file aims to provide fantasy managers with the intel they need as news breaks around MLB . the team are scheduled to host the Pittsburgh Pirates at 6:40 p.m. ET . there is also some concern at Coors Field with the Colorado Rockies entertaining the Chicago Cubs .

title: The game is on the line: Which WNBA player gets the last shot?
content: nneka Ogwumike's clutch bucket at the buzzer gives the Storm an 84-82 win over the Mystics . sports experts contend there's no such thing as a consistent clutch player in any sport . who are the biggest clutch shooters in the WNBA, when a game is on the line .

title: College football hot seats: Brace yourselves for potential blue-blood turnover
content: the college football job market took an expected turn last year . last offseason, there was a dip in head coaching changes at FBS football . the year before, a record 32 jobs turned over, per NCAA statistics .

title: PLL semifinals preview: Stats, matchups, how to watch
content: the 2025 premier lacrosse league playoffs continue this weekend on ESPN . the four teams travel to Subaru Park outside of Philadelphia for the semifinals . sports analyst Quint Kessenich revealed his keys to both matches . he will move ahead of casey Powel with four points .

title: Week 1 preview: Player expectations, freshmen to watch and more
content: all eyes will be on no. 1 Texas - No. 3 Ohio State as the Longhorns travel to the Horseshoe on sunday . quarterback arch Manning and Ohio State wide receiver Jeremiah Smith will play in a tough road matchup to start the season .

title: Who has a shot at the championship? Projecting conference and Finals winners
content: this season, the Oklahoma City Thunder will look to become the first back-to-back champions since 2018 . but there will be plenty of challengers . the new york Knicks have plenty of postseason experience to push even fury .

title: MLB Power Rankings: Where every team stands as final month approaches
content: alden Gonzalez and Jesse Rogers weigh in on who they like most to come out on top of the American League wild-card race . teams are mostly split into three categories: those preparing for the playoffs, those trying to make a run at contention and those whose focus has turned to next season . there's still a fair amount to play for within those groups .

title: Where will your team's next ballpark be? What Royals can teach us about the future of MLB stadiums
content: The K is located in the Truman Sports Complex, next to Arrowhead Stadium . your feelings about that location might depend on how you view the relationship between baseball and the cities in which it is played . in 2021, so long ago that Bobby Witt Jr. had not yet debuted in the majors, Royals owner John Sherman announced a search for a new venue .

title: Young Eze's desire to improve led him back to Arsenal
content: eberechi Eze was released from the academy at 13 . the 27-year-old joined arsenal from crystal palace in ¬£67.5m deal . he's achieved what most professional footballers dream of, even if he is rejected by a club .
